channel.description: Week 5 Announcements Where we Are Lab 4 Due Tomorrow Week 3 Response Due Today! Week 4 Today 4 PM - CDC Infrastructure! Lab 5 & 6 Week from Friday Up Next Lab 4 Tips: 4 or 5 VMs - Snapshots Windows AD -> Windows 10 Ubuntu LDAP -> Ubuntu Now with TLS Certificates! Windows AD -> Ubuntu Super Simple! Lab 5 Create Cloud Resources Configure SSH Domain Name TLS Certificates Virtual Hosts Load Balancer Cloud Resources https://education.github.com/pack DO Droplet - 2 x $5/month DO Load Balancer - $10/month (used very little) Namecheap Domain https://nc.me/ - Free for first year Let's Encrypt Certificates - Free Total Cost ~ $15 or less Lab 6 File Servers Automatically Map Resources Application Servers Frontend/Backend Keep in Touch! Discussions on Piazza Zoom Discussions "Tea Time" Office Hours One-on-One Office Hours Rocket.chat
